ai_endpoints_title: Improve your applications with AI Endpoints
ai_endpoints_description: Designed for simplicity, our platform allows developers of any skill level to enhance their applications with cutting-edge AI APIs—no AI expertise required.
ai_endpoints_descriptionBis: No AI expertise or dedicated infrastructure is needed to use these APIs. They run on a serverless platform that provides access to advanced AI models, including language models (LLM), natural language processing, translation, voice recognition, image recognition, and much more. Developers can choose from a range of models, particularly open-source options like Mistral AI, Llama and Stable Diffusion.
ai_endpoints_guide1Description: Discover AI Endpoints, OVHcloud’s secure serverless platform designed for developers, offering access to top AI models via user-friendly APIs. No AI expertise required.
ai_endpoints_guide2Description: Discover the current features, capabilities, and limitations of AI Endpoints
ai_endpoints_guide3Description: Explore our tutorials on how to elevate your applications with AI Endpoints. Learn how to build chatbots and integrate LLMs or tools to create cutting-edge solutions.
